source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_001<tab>Lali-just the sinner I've been looking for-ho.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_001おぉ、旅の人よ、いいところに。
実はちょうど話したいことがあったんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_002<tab>Another one of those recording devices has arrived from Konogg. Seems the lad has more he wants to say to you. Here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_002実はまた、コノッグから記録媒体が届いてな。
俺には何が書かれているのかわからないが……
どうやらコノッグは、あんたに何かを伝えたいみたいだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_003<tab>When you have a moment, be sure to see what's on it.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_003<tab>あとで内容を確認してみてくれ。
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_000_004<tab>(-？？？？-)おや、そこにおるのは、親方と、旅の人ではないか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_100_004<tab>Yes, the two of you! What are you doin', talkin' and noddin' suspiciously!? What are you up to!?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_100_004<tab>お前達は、こそこそと……いったい何をしておる！？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_000_005<tab><gasp> You're conspirin' to take over the village, aren't you!? Just like those murderous machines!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_000_005まさか……この村を乗っ取る気か……！
あの、襲撃者達のように……！？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_000_006<tab>Huh? What am I...? What did I just...? Unnngh, my head...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_000_006あ……いや……すまない……。
なんでもないのじゃ、今聞いたことは、忘れてくれ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_007<tab>Something's not right with Glagg. And it's not quite the same sort of “not right” what follows a few too many casks of ale...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_007グラッグの奴、なんだか様子がおかしかったが……
大丈夫だろうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_008<tab>Well, whatever it is, it's nothing you need to worry about. I'll take care of it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_008すまないな、旅の人は気にしないでくれ。
グラッグのことは、こっちでなんとかするさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_009<tab>Now then, was there something else you needed?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_009<tab>そうだ、旅の人は何か話があってきてくれたのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_A1_000_001<tab>Is there anything I can help with?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_A1_000_001<tab>他に手伝えることはないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_013<tab>You... What do you want? If you're here to mock us, have done with it and leave us be.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_013<tab>お、お前は、まさか俺達の活動に抗議しにきたのか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_014<tab>N-No, I'm not here to mock you. On the contrary, I want to join you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_014い、いや……違うんだ。
その……あんたたちが、復興のために働いているのを見ていてな、
自分も、なんというか、手伝いたくなったんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_015<tab>I'm usually not one to get involved, preferring to observe from a safe distance while making the occasional comment to remind people of my presence. But seeing how hard you've been working for the village, I couldn't help but want to make myself useful for a change.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_015わたしは利口なドワーフだからな、きっと……
きっと役に立つことができるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_016<tab>Well, we could certainly use all the help we can get... What say you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Shall we welcome him to the crew?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_016協力してくれるのは嬉しいが……
どうする？　旅の人よ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_017<tab>Thank you! I'm certain you won't regret it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_017ありがとう。
きっと、役に立ってみせるよ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_018<tab>After that strangeness with Glagg, I wasn't sure what to expect from our dour friend, but it sure wasn't an offer of help.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_018そうしたら、手伝いを申し出てくれた利口なあいつとも、
この村をどうやって復興させていくか、話し合ってみるよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_019<tab>Anyway, I'll find a moment to talk with the fellow about our plans. And when he's managed to settle in, you ought to have a word with him too.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_019しばらく時間が経ったら準備が整うと思うから、
あとで利口なあいつに話しかけてくれ。
また手伝いを依頼させてもらう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_020<tab>But to answer your earlier question─there's nothing we need you for right now. Only a matter of time before we call on you again, though, so kick your feet up while you can.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_020<tab>それまで旅の人は疲れを癒してくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>A weekly quest which continues the story is now available from the dour dwarf in Komra.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_023コメラの村の「利口な村人」より、
新たな物語へと繋がる「ウィークリークエスト」を、
受注することができるようになりました。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>Lend your aid and help the dwarves of Komra to rebuild their home.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>コメラの村を復興すべく、利口な村人に力を貸してあげましょう。
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>「コノッグからのメッセージ2」を入手した。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The message can be viewed in your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Portable Archive<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which is available under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_031※メインコマンドの「コンテンツ情報」項目にある、
「だいじなもの」から、「情報記録端末」を選ぶことで、
「コノッグからのメッセージ」を確認することができます。
